data.text: @1NewsNZ @Breakfaston1 Yeah well we're fucked now anyway, so what's the difference, kill off the weak, the old and the vulnerable while the government forces bullshit vaccine passes on people so now we can't even go and get a fucking coffee, your out of fucking job now Jacinta, you won't get my vote.

@1NewsNZ NZ how about a balanced transparent approach.?
1 No mandates
2 No vax passports
3 Free RAT tests
4 Work fm hm
5 Vit C, D3, NAC, etc.
6 Early treatments (Eg oral, iver, hydro, etc)
7 Vax those who want

9 No Masks
